entries.name: appendable?()
entries.desc: Returns true if the APPE command may be applied to the file.

entries.name: creatable?()
entries.desc: Returns true if files may be created in the directory by STOU, STOR, APPE, and RNTO.

entries.name: deletable?()
entries.desc: Returns true if the file or directory may be deleted by DELE/RMD.

entries.name: directory?()
entries.desc: Returns true if the entry is a directory (i.e., the value of the type fact is dir, cdir, or pdir).

entries.name: directory_makable?()
entries.desc: Returns true if the MKD command may be used to create a new directory within the directory.

entries.name: enterable?()
entries.desc: Returns true if the directory may be entered by CWD/CDUP.

entries.name: file?()
entries.desc: Returns true if the entry is a file (i.e., the value of the type fact is file).

entries.name: listable?()
entries.desc: Returns true if the listing commands, LIST, NLST, and MLSD are applied to the directory.

entries.name: purgeable?()
entries.desc: Returns true if the objects in the directory may be deleted, or the directory may be purged.

entries.name: readable?()
entries.desc: Returns true if the RETR command may be applied to the file.

entries.name: renamable?()
entries.desc: Returns true if the file or directory may be renamed by RNFR.

entries.name: writable?()
entries.desc: Returns true if the STOR command may be applied to the file.
